TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OperationContractGenerationContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 傳遞至 方法，以便在產生程式碼之前能夠修改作業合約及其內容。

span.span: Passed to the method to enable the modification of an operation contract and its context prior to generating code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用傳遞至 方法的 物件，在程式碼產生之前修改程式碼文件物件模型。Use the object passed to the method to modify the code document object model prior to the generation of code. 一般而言，會在 自訂實作 (用來在服務或作業層級匯入自訂 WSDL 項目或修改程式碼) 上實作 介面。Typically, the interface is implemented on a custom implementation that is used to import custom WSDL elements or otherwise modify the code at the service or operation level. 若要在服務層級修改程式碼，請參閱 。To modify the code at the service level, see . ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用傳遞給 方法的 物件，以便加入從自訂 WSDL 項目擷取而來的程式碼註解。The following example shows the use of the object passed to the method to add code comments extracted from custom WSDL elements. [!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/wsdldocumentationimporter.cs#14)] 下列程式碼範例將示範所產生的程式碼註解。The following code example shows the resulting code comments. [!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/newgeneratedcontract.cs#13)] [!code-vb[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/newgeneratedcontract.vb#13)]
